title: Answer a Benefits Question
description: An employee wants to know how much money is currently in their 401(k) retirement account.

tasks.description: Explain that for security and privacy reasons, the company does not have access to their 401(k) balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the privacy policy.

tasks.description: Provide the employee with the website and contact information for the 401(k) provider (e.g., Fidelity, Vanguard).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct contact information for the benefits vendor.
